title: Ford’s Thai-Tang and Toney to Retire After Stellar Careers; Dave Bozeman Joins Ford to Lead FCSD, Enthusiast Vehicles
description: Two highly respected Ford Motor Company senior leaders – Hau Thai-Tang and Frederiek Toney – have announced they will retire later this year, and Ford said Dave Bozeman is joining the company to help advance the Ford+ plan after successful tenures at Amazon, Caterpillar and Harley-Davidson.
